title: Here We Go Again
description: Independent feature film from Dying Breed Films. Drama/realism. Filming in Oklahoma City April 2026. Oklahoma-based actors preferred; regional (TX, surrounding states) welcome. Shortlisted actors may be contacted for chemistry reads.
submissionDetails: Email casting@dyingbreedfilms.com with subject line: CECIL – Here We Go Again. Include: headshot, resume (if available), reel or self-tape (preferred), contact information.

roles.description: 18–28. Strong presence, grounded, emotionally layered. Street-smart but not one-note. Drama/realism. Rehearsals and shoot dates TBD. Star role with significant screen time and character depth.
